CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(GDPR_compliance_was_met_check__c , "NO - MINOR BREACH"), (Tool_Applications_Score__c + Eurostar_Voice_Scoring__c + Compliance_Was_Met_Scoring__c + Wild_Card_Scoring__c + Right_resolution_score__c) * 0.8, Tool_Applications_Score__c + Eurostar_Voice_Scoring__c + Compliance_Was_Met_Scoring__c + Wild_Card_Scoring__c + Right_resolution_score__c)
CustomField.label: Total Scoring Points
